shortdesc.$: You can find out everything you need to know about operating your appliance here.

p.$: The Eco 50° programme is set by default.

The Eco 50° programme is an especially environmentally friendly programme and ideal for normally soiled tableware. It is the most efficient programme for the combination of energy/water consumption for this type of tableware and evidences conformity with the EU Ecodesign Directive.
If you do not perform any actions on the appliance for 10 minutes, the appliance will automatically switch off.

shortdesc.$: To adjust the wash cycle to the soiling level of the tableware, select a suitable programme.

p.$: The programme is set and the programme button flashes.

shortdesc.$: You can set additional functions to complete the washing programme selected.

p.$: The additional functions which can be used depend on the programme selected.
Press the button for the relevant additional function.
The additional function is set and the additional function button flashes.

shortdesc.$: You can delay the start of the programme by up to 24 hours.

BSHCollectionOfElements.$: repeatedly until the display shows the right time.
Depending on the setting of the time display, the end of the programme is shown on the display either with
(e.g. 15:20 hours). You can change this setting in the
The programme has ended when the display shows

p.$: If you want to add more tableware while the appliance is running, do not use the tablet collecting tray as a handle for the top basket. You might touch the partially dissolved tablet.
You can only change a programme when running if you cancel it.

The appliance switches off automatically 1 minute after the end of the programme to save energy. If you open the appliance door immediately after the programme has ended, the appliance will switch off after 4 seconds.

When you open the appliance door once the appliance has heated up, leave the door slightly ajar for a few minutes and then close it. This will help prevent excess pressure building up in the appliance and stop the appliance door bursting open.
The programme is saved and the appliance switches off.

shortdesc.$: To end a programme early or to switch from a programme that has already started, you will need to cancel it first.

BSHCollectionOfElements.$: As soon as the displays are off, the display shows

p.$: The programme is cancelled and ends after approx. 1 minute.

shortdesc.$: You can show information about programmes and additional functions on the display.

p.$: Press the programme button or an additional function.

BSHCollectionOfElements.$: during the wash cycle, the programme currently running will be interrupted. When you switch the appliance back on, the programme continues automatically.
